page.seoDescription: Tired of slow updates? Flipika is the fast-moving ReportGarden alternative with modern UI and AI built-in.
page.subtitle: ReportGarden feels stuck in the past. Flipika ships new features every week.
page.painPointsSubtitle: Don't let your tools slow you down.
page.migrationCtaDesc: Join the platform that evolves as fast as digital marketing.

speed.title: Blazing Speed
speed.description: Everything in Flipika is instant. No waiting for reports to generate or refresh.

realtime.title: Live Collaboration
realtime.description: Work on reports with your team in real-time, just like in Google Docs.

design.title: Fresh UI
design.description: A clean, uncluttered interface that makes complex data look simple.

whitelabel.title: Total Branding
whitelabel.description: Control every pixel of your client's experience. Domain, favicon, email sender.

ai.title: AI Copilot
ai.description: ReportGarden gives you data. Flipika gives you data + AI interpretation.

support.title: Proactive Support
support.description: We don't just fix bugs. We listen to your feature requests and build them.

ecommerce.title: High Volume Ecom
ecommerce.description: Handle thousands of SKUs and campaigns without the interface lagging.

leadgen.title: Performance Agencies
leadgen.description: For teams where every minute counts. Setup reports in seconds.

agency.title: Scaling Agencies
agency.description: Onboard 50 new clients? Done in a few clicks with mass-templating.

local.title: Multi-Location
local.description: Manage hundreds of GMB and Local Ads locations effortlessly.

saas.title: Data-Driven SaaS
saas.description: Visualize complex funnel metrics clearly for stakeholders.

step1.title: Sync Accounts
step1.description: Connect your ad networks securely. We map your client hierarchy automatically.

step2.title: Select Metrics
step2.description: Drag and drop the widgets you need. No coding required.

step3.title: Automate Delivery
step3.description: Set the schedule. Weekly, monthly, or on-demand.

step4.title: Focus on Strategy
step4.description: Stop wrestling with the report builder. Spend time analyzing.

time.title: Report Generation Time
time.description: ReportGarden can take minutes to generate a PDF. Flipika does it in milliseconds.

maintenance.title: Learning Curve
maintenance.description: New staff learn Flipika in 10 minutes. It's intuitive by design.

opportunity.title: Feature Lag
opportunity.description: When Google releases a new metric, we have it days later. Not months.

tip1.title: Clean Up Data
tip1.description: Migration is a great time to audit your old templates. Remove metrics clients don't look at.

tip2.title: Enable Live View
tip2.description: Show clients the live dashboard first. They will prefer it over the PDF.

tip3.title: Use Portfolios
tip3.description: Group similar clients and manage their reporting settings in bulk.

tip4.title: Automate Comments
tip4.description: Let AI draft your executive summary. Edit it, don't write it from scratch.

tip5.title: Check Mobile
tip5.description: Ensure your new reports look great on phone. Clients check metrics on the go.

tip6.title: White Label Email
tip6.description: Set up your SMTP so emails come from you, not 'noreply@flipika.com'.

tip7.title: Feedback Loop
tip7.description: Ask clients what they think of the new look. They usually love the upgrade.

faq.a1: Very. We pull structure directly from the ad platforms. No manual mapping needed.
faq.a2: We pull up to 24 months of history instantly upon connection.
faq.a3: Yes, full white label support on all plans.
faq.a4: Yes, our multi-location features are robust for franchise reporting.
faq.q5: Is there a limit on reports?
faq.a5: No. Unlimited reports on all agency plans.
faq.a6: Faster and more technical. We are marketers building for marketers.
faq.a7: Currently laser-focused on Google Ads/PPC to be the best at it, but more coming.
faq.a8: Competitive pricing that scales better as you add more clients.
